subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Sidney Crosby is expected to miss six to eight weeks, the most serious blow in a series of setbacks for the Penguins, who were already without goaltender Marc-André Fleury.
snippet: Sidney Crosby is expected to miss six to eight weeks, the most serious blow in a series of setbacks for the Penguins, who were already without goaltender Marc-André Fleury.
